name: Colour Box V2
details:
New version of the neve preamp/boostAn effects pedal that replicates the hard to achieve sounds of "direct-in" electric guitar recordings.

Output transformer
Safely Passes 48v Phantom Power
EQ Shift Knobs for precision EQ control
Hi/Lo Switch for ultra clean headroom
100% available clean signal even on acoustic guitar
Silent switching, aka no "switch-pop"
Runs on standard 9V DC Neg power
Combination XLR and 1/4" input jack to use either an instrument or microphone. Input selector switch on the right side of the pedal labeled INST/XLR.
